headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Schlumberger (SLB) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: SLB’s Depressed Shares Don’t Reflect the Company’s Profitability
summary: The oil-and-gas industry is likely to supply a big chunk of the world’s energy needs for the remainder of the century, and SLB will be there to service it.
